Body:
pattern = ci_pattern.CIPattern(normalization=10.0, regions=[(0, 3, 0, 1), (
    0, 3, 3, 4)])
image = np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 3.0], [4.0, 5.0, 1.1, 6.0, 7.0], [
    8.0, 9.0, 1.1, 10.0, 11.0]])
frame = ci_frame.ChInj(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_left(), ci_pattern=pattern)
new_frame = frame.serial_edges_and_trails_frame_from_frame(image,
    front_edge_columns=(0, 1), trails_columns=(0, 1))
assert (new_frame == np.array([[0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 2.0, 3.0], [4.0, 5.0, 0.0, 
    6.0, 7.0], [8.0, 9.0, 0.0, 10.0, 11.0]])).all()
